xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/570920-CHRONO TRIGGER ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK SPECIAL DVD 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zhyc4nuaMZqYDUvtHh2Y5TrPv9A.jpg Renewed for the DS release, Square Enix updated the fantasy RPG favourited classic Chrono Trigger with several new functions, among these updates, the most obvious ones are the new visuals and the music. On this DVD, you get to experience both of these updates at the same time. See how much better the familiar tracks sounded in this new remastered version, and hear from the composer himself, Yasunori Mitsuda. CHRONO TRIGGER ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK SPECIAL DVD
